data.author: Chris Schlitt

changelog.release_notes: -Updated Dodger's logo

-Fixed a bug where the watchface would report "Final" before the game was over
-Adjusted the Blue Jays logo
-Added debugging information
-Fixed Reds Logo
-All Star Game Patch

-Added support for the All Star Game 
-Bug fixes

-Added timeout for server fails
-Altered the 6 and the 9 to look less like an 8
- Added load balancer and a backup server

-Fixed a bug where the watch would report "Final" before the game was over
-Fixed a bug where the watch would not display a score for a team
-Minro Bugfixes

- Fixed an issue where the watchface would show the next day's game between 9pm and midnight PST
- Fixed Giants logo
- Bug fixes

- Fixed a bug that caused the watch not to update during the game
- Fixed a bug where the team logo and colors would not be displayed

-Restored Aplite Support
-Added Legacy Bases Graphic for Square Watches
-Corrected Several Team Logos
-Bug Fixes

-Corrected timezone issue
-Broadcasts now reflect favorite team instead of home team

All new for the 2016 season:
-Support for Pebble Time Round
-Shake to Show Broadcast Information
-Improved Battery Life
-Fix for days where there is only one game in the playoffs

-Weather API fix
-Loading screen fix

-Added Weather and Calendar (customizable and removable)
-Changed Clock Font
-Updated Cardinals Logo
-Bug Fixes
-Battery Improvements
-Washington Nationals fix
-Bug Fixes
-Fixed an issue where in rare cases the bases graphic would not show

data.description:
All new for the 2016 season:
-Support for Pebble Time Round
-Shake to Show Broadcast Information
-Improved Battery Life
-New Bases Display

With MLB live faces you'll never miss the action of Major League Baseball all summer long!

Customizable to any of the 30 teams, MLB live faces will provide you with:

Before the Game:
-Start Time
-Starting Pitchers
-Broadcast Information

During the Game:
-Score
-Inning + Half
-Who's on first, what's on second, I don't know's on third
-Outs

After the Game:
-Final Score

While a game is in play, the watch face will load data every minute to keep you up to date on the action.  When there isn't a game going on, the watch face will only update every 15 minutes to 1 hour to conserve battery life.
data.title: MLB Live Face
